item.description:
I'm hosting this event..thanks to me ?;-)

 

Come once again to the Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight.

Enjoy a delicious brunch; (the Prix Fixe menu gives you a choice of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea & a sweet ala Julia Child….all for $9.95 (taxes & tips additional)), as well as great conversations, smiles, laughs, etc.

Parking is FREE adjacent to the restaurant.

Please pay server directly…Paypal is not accepted at this event
item.how_to_find_us: We will have our own section at the rear of the restaraunt
item.name: Come together at The Gaslight for Brunch!
